sentences.sContent: It looks like a cyborg trilobite; just the thing you want to caress while scrolling through the next chapter of “Victorians on Venus”.
sentences.sContent_eng: It looks like a cyborg trilobite; just the thing you want to caress while scrolling through the next chapter of “Victorians on Venus”.
sentences.sCn: 它看起来像一只电子三叶虫，当你在电脑上阅读蒸汽朋克小说的时候，这款鼠标用起来准让你爱不释手。

sentences.sContent: In addition, the trilobite said, the shifting of tectonic plates, and with them, the birth of new mountain ranges, river valleys, and coastlines, seemed to be coming along great.
sentences.sContent_eng: In addition, the trilobite said, the shifting of tectonic plates, and with them, the birth of new mountain ranges, river valleys, and coastlines, seemed to be coming along great.
sentences.sCn: 这只三叶虫还补充说大陆板块正在移动，随之而来的还有全新的山脉、河谷和海岸线的诞生，这些看上去很完美。

trans.tranOther: a type of  fossil  of a small sea creature
